price: [Isaan] ni jedhan: “Nuti guyyaa tokko yookiin garii guyyaa jiraanne, Warra lakkaa’an gaafadhu.”
arabic: قَالُواْ لَبِثۡنَا يَوۡمًا أَوۡ بَعۡضَ يَوۡمٖ فَسۡـَٔلِ ٱلۡعَآدِّينَ

version.title: Oromo translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Oromo by Ghaly Ababour Abaghuna, printed in 2009.

meta.transliteration: qālū labith'nā yawman aw baʿḍa yawmin fasali al-ʿādīna
